author: Bobalina Smith
content: "Darling David, it seems you're so out of tune that even the most harmonious of angels wouldn't dare whisper sweet nothings to those Gibson guitars – they'd rather stick needles in their eyes!"

author: Bobalina Jones
content: "Lord have mercy, David's got his fretboard tangled up tighter than a plate of my famous Nashville nachos - he's so outta tune, I reckon even the most tone-deaf harmonica player wouldn't dare play along!"

author: Bobalina Smith
content: "Darling David, it seems you're so tone-deaf that even the sweet serenades of angels wouldn't harmonize with your union-izing guitars – they'd rather play a kazoo solo!"

author: Bobalina Jones
content: "Aw shucks, David's got his strings all tangled up like a plate of spaghetti at the county fair - he just can't seem to get his harmonious groove on when it comes to treatin' guitars right!"

author: Bobalina Smith
content: "Darling David, it seems you're so lost in the land of make-believe that even a harmonica solo wouldn't bring harmony to this debate – and I'm not just whistlin' Dixie!"
